original: Balger, John Ernfrid, apote>kare, Mölndal, f. 22/10/89 i Ölmevalla, Hall. 1. G. 25 m. Lilly Hellström. Barn: Sture f. 26, Kerstin 30, Eva 34. — Stud:ex. i Gbg 09, farm. kand. 12, apot:ex. 21. Elev v. apot. Hjorten i Gbg 09-11, anst. v. Korpen i Gbg 12- 19 o. 21-26, förest, isex mån., Lejonet i Gbg 26-33, Kronan i Gbg 33-35, Strutsen i Gbg 35-37, priv. å apot. i Örkelljunga 37, transp. t. apot. i Mölndal 43. Rev. i Farmac. sjukkassa 29-31, ordf. i Örkelljunga luftsk :fören. 38. Skr.: Ett avsnitt av den nordhalländska floran’ (37), art. i luftsk :frå-gor.
translated: Balger, John Ernfrid, pharmacist, Mölndal, born 22/10/89 in Ölmevalla, Halland. Married first in 1925 to Lilly Hellström. Children: Sture born in 1926, Kerstin born in 1930, Eva born in 1934. He passed high school in Gothenburg in 1909, graduated from pharmacy studies in 1912 and became a licensed pharmacist in 1921. He was a trainee at the Hjorten pharmacy in Gothenburg from 1909 to 1911, employed at Korpen pharmacy in Gothenburg from 1912 to 1919 and from 1921 to 1926, and was head pharmacist at Lejonet pharmacy in Gothenburg from 1926 to 1933. He worked at Kronan pharmacy in Gothenburg from 1933 to 1935, Strutsen pharmacy in Gothenburg from 1935 to 1937, had a private pharmacy in Örkelljunga in 1937, and was transferred to a pharmacy in Mölndal in 1943. He was a board member of the Pharmaceutical Sick Fund from 1929 to 1931 and chairman of the Örkelljunga Air Association in 1938. He wrote an article on the flora of the northern Halland in 1937 and contributed to articles on aviation issues.

article.name: Ett avsnitt av den nordhalländska floran
